summary: Patch for../modules/MBTilesFileArchive.java to allow unmodified mbtiles to be used on android

comments.content: This is only a small addition, I added SQLiteDatabase.NO_LOCALIZED_COLLATORS to the getDatabaseFileArchive function which will prevent people from having to modify the mbtiles files to add the android metadata table
I'll take your word for it that this works.
This issue was closed by revision r984.
